metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000036 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In MuPDF 1.12.0 and earlier, multiple memory leaks in the PDF parser allowan attacker to cause a denial of service (memory leak) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
